titleInfo.title: Map showing the boundary of Persia and India

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:266 x 215 mm, on sheet 352 x 255 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Lithographed in the Superit. Engineerâ€™s Office P.D. April 1866.Distinctive Features:Outline map showing in red the traditionally perceived boundary of Persia and India and Lt-Col Goldsmid's amended boundary in blue, his travelled route in relation to these boundaries and also corrected boundaries for the Bampur district.
